unnormalised: Arre yaar, don't forget to link your PAN card ABCDE1234F with your Aadhaar number before 31/03. It's mandatory now, otherwise, you'll have problems filing your ITR. Also, did you update your GSTIN 09AAAAA0000A1Z5 after the latest amendment? Tax season is a total headache!
normalised: Arre yaar, don't forget to link your P-A-N card A-B-C-D-E-one-two-three-four-F with your Aadhaar number before thirty first march. It's mandatory now, otherwise, you'll have problems filing your I-T-R. Also, did you update your G-S-T-I-N zero-nine-triple-A-A-A-zero-zero-zero-zero-A-one-Z-five after the latest amendment? Tax season is a total headache!
